fields.text: A unique aura available only to Barbarians
Grants Maximum Life %, Damage Resistance %, and Attack Rating to allies
Rip asunder the ground in front of you, wrecking havoc on your foes
Uses the same skill as barb; can also benefit from it's synergies
Send forth waves of rock to crush your enemies beneath the weight
Uses the same skill as druid; can also benefit from it's synergies
Throw multiple axes at once, burning the flesh of nearby enemies
Natural  Resistance, Exoskeleton, Combat Efficiency, Battle Tested
Uses the same skill as barb; can also benefit from it's synergies
Enter a state of unrestricted rage, gaining speed and damage with every hit
Uses the same skill as barb; can also benefit from it's synergies
Battle Knowledge gives you and allies defensive prowess
